flavorText: Dreams are just one more form of torment.

foreignData.flavorText: Träume sind nur eine weitere Form von Qualen.
foreignData.name: Unterweltstraum
foreignData.text: Immer wenn ein Gegner eine Karte zieht, fügt ihm der Unterweltstraum 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Los sueños solo son un tormento más.
foreignData.name: Sueños del infierno
foreignData.text: Siempre que un oponente robe una carta, los Sueños del infierno hacen 1 punto de daño a ese jugador.

foreignData.flavorText: Les rêves ne sont qu'une autre forme de tourment.
foreignData.name: Rêves du monde souterrain
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'un adversaire pioche une carte, les Rêves du monde souterrain infligent 1 blessure à ce joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: I sogni non sono che un'altra forma di tormento.
foreignData.name: Sogni del Mondo Sotterraneo
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un avversario pesca una carta, i Sogni del Mondo Sotterraneo infliggono 1 danno a quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: 夢は単に苦悩の一つの形に過ぎない。
foreignData.name: 地獄界の夢
foreignData.text: 対戦相手がカードを１枚引くたび、地獄界の夢はそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.name: 저승의 꿈
foreignData.text: 상대가 카드를 뽑을 때마다, 저승의 꿈은 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os sonhos são só mais um tipo de tormento.
foreignData.name: Sonhos do Submundo
foreignData.text: Toda vez que um oponente compra um card, Sonhos do Submundo causa 1 ponto de dano àquele jogador.

foreignData.flavorText: Сны — лишь еще один способ пытки.
foreignData.name: Сны Подземелья
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда оппонент берет карту, Сны Подземелья наносят 1 повреждение тому игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 梦境不过是另一种形式的折磨。
foreignData.name: 地底幻梦
foreignData.text: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，地底幻梦对该牌手造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 夢境不過是另一種形式的折磨。
foreignData.name: 地底幻夢
foreignData.text: 每當任一對手抽一張牌時，地底幻夢對該玩家造成1點傷害。

name: Underworld Dreams
originalText: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.

rulings.text: If multiple cards are drawn at once, this card triggers once for each card drawn.
In a multi-player game, it affects all opponents.
If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it’s not a card drawn.

text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.
